website_summaries.verdict: Perfect for babies with allergies, these drops are free of parabens, BPA, animal products, dairy, peanuts, tree nuts, fish, shellfish, and soy.
pros: A simple formula consisting only of sunflower oil, medium-chain triglycerides (a man-made fat), and l reuteri, the most popular strain of probiotic for digestive health
Parents praise its effectiveness and appreciate its clean, natural ingredients
cons: Some parents had concerns about the shipping's effects on the bacteria
The product should stay below 77 degrees, but it is shipped without a cold pack

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I started using these on my newborn because she had bad reflux and just an all around upset tummy. I wasn’t crazy about the price but thought it was worth a shot. I continued using them for 3 months and her tummy was doing better. I wasn’t sure if they helped or not, so I decided to stop and didn’t place a new order. Within 2 days, her tummy issues got so much worse than they had been. I waited a few days to assess what the problem was and then reordered the probiotics. Within 2 days of restarting them, she was back to her normal happy self!
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Mohl

customer_reviews.title: BEST STUFF EVER
customer_reviews.text: My baby was crying for hours at night because of belly pain! Nothing would soothe him, not nursing, not rocking, not singing, not gripe water... I tried 3 different brands! Until this beauty arrives in the mail! First night giving them to him he slept the whole night through... I thought it was a fluke until it happened again the next night and so on!! These are miracle drops and every parent should have it in their arsenal!! We suggested it to our friends that just had a baby. He cried all day all night and since giving him these drops he’s slept through the night as well without the belly pain!!! BEST STUFF EVER!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tera Allridge

customer_reviews.title: Came in another language
customer_reviews.text: Can’t read these instructions as they are in another language. Come on. Im a busy mom with a fussy 7 week old. Figuring out how to administer this shouldn’t include translating another language. Ordered them in English per photos used to advertise. This is frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: I was amazed, how this supplement actually made my daughter regular
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews I gave this a try with my 6m old daughter,that would go 4-6days before pooping. Although with ebf I know it’s okay to go that long, I felt she was a little uncomfortable! A few hours after the first day of giving her it she pooped I thought gotta be a fluke, until the 2nd day same thing and 3rd day and actually the whole week it made her regular daily! I was amazed, how this supplement actually made my daughter regular! The only reason I didn’t give it 5 stars is the bottle is very small, and it’s hard to see exactly how much is left in the bottle!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pediatrician was happy.
customer_reviews.text: Works for gassy and fussy baby. Also helps with spit ups. Easy to use. My daughters pediatrician was happy that I picked this probiotic. This is the right bacteria for colicky, gassy, and baby’s who spit up a lot.
customer_reviews.author: A. Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Helps with baby gas
customer_reviews.text: My six month old has been taking these drops since he was one month. He was diagnosed with reflux and has been on two different medications. While I hated introducing the medicine into his immature digestive system, I knew we needed to so he would be able to eat. I started giving him these probiotics to help him handle the medication and deal with his gassiness. He's a much happier and less gassy baby while taking these drops. They are kind of a pain to get into his mouth, but totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A.

customer_reviews.title: No applicator
customer_reviews.text: I used this product with my first child and it was excellent. Just had my second baby and ordered these again, except now there is no applicator and it's hard to identify how many drops are actually coming out as the packaging has changed. The product itself is great. If you are using bottles, then this is would be very easy to administer by putting the drops in the milk bottle. But if you're breastfeeding, then this product is challenging to get into baby's mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Hill

customer_reviews.title: Not for us.
customer_reviews.text: These probiotics did not agree with my son. As soon as we started these, he began straining to pass gas and poop. The one pro is how easy it is to give to baby.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great for Fussy No Sleep Baby
customer_reviews.text: My son has severe acid reflux and was colicky. He would fall asleep around 10:30 PM every night and would only sleep until about 2:30 AM every morning. After 2:30 AM he would wake up grunting and uncomfortable from stomach issues. We didn’t go back to sleep after 2:30 AM. After about two days on these probiotic drops my son was sleeping 6 to 7 hours solid at night. I will forever be a believer in these things!
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Tussing

customer_reviews.title: LIFESAVER
customer_reviews.text: LIFESAVER!!! We overnighted these drops for our two month old baby, after a pediatric nurse recommended it to us. We saw a huge difference in our baby within about 3-4 days. She is much more content, sleeps for longer stretches now, and there is a dramatic decrease in her colic. We will continue to use. Was worth spending a little extra to overnight the product. No issues with packaging either like others had in their reviews.
customer_reviews.author: George K.

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t notice difference
customer_reviews.text: Can’t tell if it made any difference. Didn’t help ease bowel movements. Baby didn’t notice the taste or reject it. It is not refrigerated. Did not buy again **please help and designate if this was helpful!
customer_reviews.author: Bethany JohnsonTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Has l reuteri
customer_reviews.text: This replaced our bioamicus probiotics (that we loved) since they are going through rebranding. While they are on the expensive side they were the only ones we could find that contained l reuteri without a bunch of other added ingredients. Probiotics have helped our son immensly. We add 5 drops a day to one of his bottles in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: KPITTTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: happy baby and mama
customer_reviews.text: started giving to our baby girl after she had been on antibiotics for 3 weeks in the NICU. she is a very happy baby most of the day, but we never appreciated these drops until we ran out and she became fussy! after restarting them, i can say that giving these to her help her stay content and also regular too! worth every penny and great for your babies’ tummy and immune health.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Hiemstra

customer_reviews.title: Resolved tummy issues after 3 days
customer_reviews.text: This product was a recommendation from our pediatrician and a miracle worker. We had to supplement with formula due to issues with my supply. Our 1 month old was having a lot of discomfort from gas and spitting up after most of his meals. After 3 days of taking Biogaia all of these issues resolved. This probiotic is slightly more expensive than others on the market but it's also a different stain of bacteria than others on the market. Its with paying more for a quality product that really works.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonLvr87

customer_reviews.title: I have a 2 year old who does well with ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2 year old who does well with this probiotic. She used to have tummy issues and have difficulty with going poop. Since using this product daily in her milk, she doesn’t have difficulty pooping. We have not noticed side effects. I will also be using this product with my newborn.
customer_reviews.author: JDK

customer_reviews.title: I think it works, packaging could use improvement.
customer_reviews.text: I think it works? My daughter was 3 weeks when we started and she cried inconsolably during and after feeds. Now we can quiet her in about 20 min, and occasionally she doesn’t cry at all. She does seem to be spitting up more since starting? Hard to say. I deducted a star for packaging. I don’t like the way this medicine dispenses (spoon feeding a newborn is really tough and ends up all over her chin...too expensive for that). Also my dog is obsessed with this stuff for some reason. He chewed through the first tube, and I caught him chewing the second before he punctured it. He’s naughty, but it also shouldn’t be that easy to puncture.
customer_reviews.author: hj

customer_reviews.title: Helped our tiny tummy troubles
customer_reviews.text: These have been perfect for our newborn daughter to help with her tiny tummy troubles. I was looking for something that didn't have vitamin D included (which she cannot tolerate every day) and came across these drops, and I'm so glad we did! It took about a week for us to really see results and we have been giving them for a few months now and have a happy baby now!!! She doesn't mind the taste and they are quick and easy and work for us! If you're experiencing tiny tummy troubles in your house, or just want to start a probiotic, it's worth a shot!
customer_reviews.author: K. Brosier

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Y’all, my baby has struggled to poop since day one. We switched formulas, stopped giving gripe water and gas drops to see if that helped, etc. etc. etc. NOTHING WORKED. So I was on a Reddit forum, deep into reading about if gas drops could actually cause constipation and this woman says she should get these probiotics. So I did.. I was willing to try anything. Now, they’re expensive, yes. And I haven’t tried other probiotics... but THESE WORK! My baby has pooped twice this week without any assistance (thermometers or Karo syrup). WORTH EVERY PENNY!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Package is small, but it works!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my almost 2 month old. He was crying from 6-10pm every night with colicky symptoms. We’re on day 3 and his symptoms have improved. The bottle is very small, like other reviews also mention.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Great for Colic
customer_reviews.text: My son had colic and recent studies showed that in many babies probiotics helped. My pediatrician said that BioGaia was what the original studies were based off of. She said it wasn't a cure all but to try it and we did. He was a COMPLETELY different baby. I wouldn't wish a colic baby one my worst enemy and I thank God every day for this little miracle drop!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan and Tasha C

customer_reviews.title: Helps with colic symptoms, painful gas, hard time pooping
customer_reviews.text: My baby used to have gas hat sounded like a machine gun and man poops that he would always have to push out with much straining and effort. This Of course was cause for lots of tears and General discomfort. Gas drops and gripe water did nothing for my baby. Since using this probiotic, baby no longer has painful bloating, super loud farts or poops. The only downside is that since I can't hear his poops anymore I have to smell his diaper or peek in and risk getting some poop smear.
customer_reviews.author: J Ha

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for us
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by our baby’s pediatrician and started about five days ago. It doesn’t seem to help at all, in fact, maybe even made it worse. She is more gaseous and constipated. Was hoping it’ll help with her gut health but I’m not sure it’s helping at all.
customer_reviews.author: lahn

customer_reviews.title: Everyday Essential
customer_reviews.text: We started using Biogaia when my daughter was only a couple weeks old due to gastrointestinal discomfort, at the recommendation of her pediatrician. It's been a daily constant since, and we know it's working because she no longer has issues... except for once when we had a shipping delay and she didn't receive it for a week - then we really noticed the difference. Now we order them 2 at a time to avoid that situation.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Really recommend it
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It's easy to use when you're breastfeeding or bottle feeding bc it's drops! The most importantly it helped my baby with her gas relief and digestion so she started to sleep better and no more drama and crying when we need to poop before it was a really dramatic process. We started using them since she was a month old and still use it and now she is 4 months old. Really recommend this for moms and their babies especially in the beginning of their life
customer_reviews.author: Lala

customer_reviews.title: Great for baby
customer_reviews.text: My daughters pediatrician recommended this specific brand of probiotics originally because she had a tough case of oral thrush at 2months old. This, along with medication, we were able to get rid of the thrush. I decided to continue using it for her gut health, and it's been great. Shes now 5 months old now and has stayed regular and with a happy tummy!
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: Really works unlike many over-the-counter products
customer_reviews.text: We had our baby on antibiotics for 14 days and she desperately needed to recover her good gut flora. Tried many usual probiotic from grocery stores and pharmacies, but didn't see much improvements in weeks. This one is not cheap, but helped with her stool on the very next day! We're traveling to islands soon so I've already bought another pack just to be on the safe side.
customer_reviews.author: Happy dad, NC

customer_reviews.title: Our pediatrician approved!
customer_reviews.text: We started these bc our poor little girl had terrible reflux issues. They helped before we were even able to get her medicine for it and even more so now that we have to thicken her bottles a bit. I brought it with us when we finally had our first meeting with our new pediatrician (due to the first one just not working out) and she literally said “Oh, I love biogaia!” Worth every penny. Keeps our little one regular and free of constipation pain because lord knows she’s been through enough pain in her first three months already!
customer_reviews.author: Ali Scott

customer_reviews.title: Good Vitamin D supplement for babies with sensitive tummies
customer_reviews.text: Our baby has been on these for about 7 months now. We started them based on a recommendation from our pediatrician. She suggested for colic, but we opted for the Vitamin D combo as well. I can't say that the priobiotic really changed her colic, but it's the only vitamin D she tolerates and doesn't make her throw up.
customer_reviews.author: East_coast_trials

customer_reviews.title: Expensive and presented like trash
customer_reviews.text: As you can see in the picture, the product was delivered in a very rough fashion. The cost is crazy high. 20$ for 25 usages. It means that it cost approximately 1$ per usage. The remedy is not miraculous. My wife wants to continue to use it, but I personally do not trust or believe it does anything to our baby with reflux. I am disappointed about the product because I also saw once the same bottle for free in a pediatrician, hence it looks like this format is the size for a tryout. It would be better if the price would be more reasonable and that the company would care about the presentation.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Product works!
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended to us by our pediatrician. We bought it when the baby seemed to be uncomfortable with gas and it has truly helped! We give 3 drops during a day feeding and 2 right before nighttime and it seems to help the baby relieve tummy pains. The product is tiny for the price but it does work! Would recommend for a baby struggling with gas!
customer_reviews.author: VF6786

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work but it feels extremely expensive
customer_reviews.text: Seller can try to persuade me with its values for money but if it was not my wife wanting to get this 5ml bottles for our daughter, no way I would buy this! We have a healthy baby so we have not had any issues with her pooping. We are giving her drops with her vitamins.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Helps with gassy tummy
customer_reviews.text: The drops helped my babys tummy out so much!!!!! I love them!!! She was colicky when I was eating dairy so while I was changing my diet I gave her these drops and they saved us some heartache! These drops are a must have if you are struggling to get your baby to pass gas easily.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Jones

customer_reviews.title: Easy product
customer_reviews.text: My daughter's pediatrician recommended she take a probiotic along with her antibiotic (augmentin), for her ear infections that weren't going away, as a precaution for potential stomach upset. I can't say for certain if this helped with any stomach discomfort. The product was easy to administer and she (1.5 years) had no problem taking it. It was also easy to have it on the counter (no refrigeration needed) to help remind us to give her the dosage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good probiotic
customer_reviews.text: I'll be honest I didn't realize how much it was helping until we ran out, its hard to know when you are at the end of the bottle. My little man's tummy was way gassier again when we were out, and not sleeping well. I wish this was on auto ship.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing design flaw in dropper on bottle
customer_reviews.text: I noticed an improvement from my twins with GERD taking this but I’ve ordered it twice now and the dropper where the 5 drop dosage comes out has broke on both bottles!! The first time nothing would come out but there was still liquid in the tube. I figured it was a fluke and reordered since it seemed to help my babies. However after only using it since Saturday (it’s Tuesday) the dropper where the drops come out leaks so it pours out leaving no way of knowing how much you’re giving your baby. I wish the bottle was better because the product itself is great .
customer_reviews.author: justin

customer_reviews.title: This really helped me recover from SIBO-C
customer_reviews.text: If you have SIBO-C, I'd recommend trying this probiotic. Everyone is different, and I've tried a lot of things, but this is the best thing I've ever tried.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: These are really helping our son’s tummy issues. Our pediatrician recommended we try these, and I’m so glad he did. Within a week he was sleeping better and had virtually stopped crying out in pain from the gas. It is a bit pricey, but they all are. These actually work, however, which makes them worth the money in this sleep deprived momma’s eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Briana Hibbard

customer_reviews.title: Worth to try it!
customer_reviews.text: This product is very good. My baby swallowed it with ease. He pooped the next day I started to give him the drops. Then, he went every 2-3 days but wasn’t fuzzy during those days. Great value for the money even though it is pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Clauditabonita

customer_reviews.title: Great dispensing design
customer_reviews.text: We usually buy the glass bottle of probiotics from walmart because they're less expensive but they were out the last trip so I bought these instead. The dispenser on this tube is WAY better than the bottle dispenser. The probiotics are the same quality. That's where the good ends. These are much more expensive per a drop so we will be sticking to the parents choice drops.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helps with fussy baby :)
customer_reviews.text: I got a sample of this with our take home bag from the midwife. Our baby was very fussy especially at night so we figured she was colicky. I started giving her five drops in the evening with food and it seems to help a lot with gas and baby is happier. I notice a difference when I forget to give it to her. It's a little pricey but worth it to help baby feel better and sleep at night.
customer_reviews.author: Hunnybare

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. My month old has been having discomfort since he was two weeks and I tried everything... his pediatrician told me to get this. Made him even worse. I do not recommend. Very upset that I spent this amount of money for something that made him worse and will just be tossed away.
customer_reviews.author: Deb F.

customer_reviews.title: Pediatrician Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by our pediatrician when our daughter was 6 weeks old due to colic. We saw a difference in about a week with her bowel movements (less straining). The price looks steep, but it is comparable to the Gerber soothe where you can find almost anywhere. This product I could not find in stores; only online.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Breastfed colic baby
customer_reviews.text: My 2 mo old baby has colic and in giving a full 5 drops I Immediately noticed her colic/crying worse for those days. I backed down to 2 drops. The lactation consultant said breast milk is working to protect and build the gut so introducing probiotics can impede this process. I stopped the probiotic until she is an older baby.
customer_reviews.author: Coffee&kids

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Works!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing, it was recommended to me from 2 different other countries, my friend from Europe and my other friend from DR... It really works, my son gets horrible colics and this definitely helps. I'm already on my second bottle, first bottle lasted about 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Sarai G.

customer_reviews.title: Don't ever switch from these!
customer_reviews.text: We love this product for our 14 month old, tried to switch to another brand when she turned one and it was a miserable night of screaming out. Switched back to these and they give her a comfortable night sleep!
customer_reviews.author: christin

customer_reviews.title: Made it worse!
customer_reviews.text: Made my daughter spit up so much worse. I contacted the manufacturer and they were dismissive and rude in their response. I could not be more disappointed than I am in this product and the “support” received. Worst customer service.
customer_reviews.author: R. R Scriven

customer_reviews.title: Must get!
customer_reviews.text: These drops work so good for my 4 month old. He’s a breast milk baby only so doctor says it could be 10 days and he won’t have a bowel movement, but right when I gave him these drops, 4 hours later he took a huge deuce. & he passes gas right when I feed him the drops.
customer_reviews.author: ree

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: N min y boys was spitting up on a daily basis after each feeding (breastfeed) . So I was desperate to try and find something to help with that and their tummy . This has worked wonders.
customer_reviews.author: Trudy

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for our 1 month old
customer_reviews.text: Our 1 month old has been a pretty content baby on formula. The only thing wrong was he would get constipated and only go once every two days. So with our pediatricians recommendation of this probiotic we gave it a try. It has been just about 2 weeks and although he is pooping very regularly, he has been sooo fussy- which we are not used to! So I will be stopping these. I’m giving 2 stars because they fixed the constipation, but in doing that, upset his tummy. - every baby is different though
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Scientific proof
customer_reviews.text: As a pharmacist, I appreciate the fact that this probiotic has actually been through a true scientific research study to prove its effectiveness. We have been using it daily for a week and slowly noticing a difference in cry time and reflux symptoms. We have a formula fed baby.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Biogaia was recommended to me by my sons doctor. I wanted something to help him poop. After the first try, my son pooped right away. I switched to two other kinds of probiotics just to try them out, but I prefer to stick to biogaia. It's a bit pricey, but worth it to me.
customer_reviews.author: antoinette montalvo

customer_reviews.title: Great for less spit up
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this for about month with our 8 week old. I haven't noticed too much of a difference with gassiness but we have seen an improvement in spitting up. My daughter has been spitting up less often. Her oral thrush has cleared up too but it might have just run it's course. We will continue using it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver 👐
customer_reviews.text: It worked wonders on my baby. He was regular and it kept him from being colicky. I can't find it up here in stores so I purchased the Gerber sooth in a desperate attempt and it doesn't do the trick. I 10000% recommend this to new moms and mom's of many. This is a lifesaver.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Helmkamp

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I started using this for my 2 1/2 month old who wasn’t pooping for 5 days at a time. Even prune juice only worked sometimes. Ever since I’ve been giving her these drops just once a week even she has been pooping every day. I also feel like her colic started winding down around the same time and I think these drops were part of the reason. Love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Hammond

customer_reviews.title: Same aside as the free samples at my dr office.
customer_reviews.text: These probiotics seem to help my baby a lot but I can’t justify the cost with the amount that you get. This bottle barely lasts 2 weeks if even that. I store it upright so it doesn’t spill and only give 5 drops a day but they run out so quickly. I’m surprised at how small the bottle is for the price. I can’t continue to spend the money on these since they run out so quickly. My dr gives free samples for the same size bottle so you’d thing the bottle I purchase would at least bigger and lay longer than a sample. I’m so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: aewatts986

customer_reviews.title: excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I use this product to my baby, because his suffer a lot of colics and this Probiotics help he to have a less colics... already he has 1 yr and 6 months but we use from 4 o5 months old
customer_reviews.author: Rafa

customer_reviews.title: Tiniest little container ever.
customer_reviews.text: This comes in the tiniest little container ever, and so I ended up losing it. No idea where it went. Expensive for such a miniscule product! I wish it were easier to keep track of. My baby didn't seem thrilled with it but also didn't refuse it entirely.
customer_reviews.author: Team Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff really help settle my little guys got issues. No it wasn't an instant cure it took time to build up in his system but I think it made a huge difference in his gas and stomach discomfort issues at night. Only thing I dont like is the bottle it comes in. Its solid white so it's hard to know when your almost out so you can reorder in time.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer peller

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I wish it was a little bit cheaper because you need to buy over and over again, it's small amount for the price. But 100% recommend I tried everything nothing helped! Highly recommended!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Miamigirl

customer_reviews.title: Helps with constipation and Colic
customer_reviews.text: My baby was diagnosed as having colic as well as constipation. As soon as we started her on a daily dose of Bio Gaia Probiotics she has regular bowel movements and honestly isn’t colic anymore. I was skeptical at first to give it to her, her pediatrician recommended it. I didn’t give it to her right away but I was out of options. So I tried it and so happy I did!! Great Product
customer_reviews.author: Mercedes Dilone

customer_reviews.title: Recommended for newborn
customer_reviews.text: Don’t know about the flavor but it worked just fine.... we spend a few nights with out sleep because of my baby’s colics, but after we tried this, she slept just fine and she looked like she had no pain anymore. Recommended for newborn
customer_reviews.author: Eunice

customer_reviews.title: Unsure about this
customer_reviews.text: Im not sure if I would recommend this. My newborn had really bad stomach problems when he was first born so I seen this and tried it. I didn't see any difference after using it a month. I don't know how it taste, The box was pretty though. I wouldn't buy it again but I know every baby is different
customer_reviews.author: Mallory & Jason

customer_reviews.title: Frustrated by shipping
customer_reviews.text: I think the product itself is fine but my issue is that on the label it says not to store Over 77 degrees F. This makes a lot of sense since this is a probiotic. The issue I have is that I wasn’t aware of this until I received the product AFTER it had been sitting in my mailbox on a 90 degree day. Feels like I wasted $20.
customer_reviews.author: leslie thomas

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: These probiotics didn’t do anything. Waste of money. It didn’t reduce the GERD, didn’t help with constipation, nor did they help baby sleep longer. Update: The nurse at our pediatrician's office suggested we give this another try when baby was taking antibiotics for an ear infection. We gave it another try, I don't know what it has really done for her tummy issues, but it seemed to keep yeast infections or anything else away that taking antibiotics might cause.
customer_reviews.author: Midnight the Cat

customer_reviews.title: Not for us
customer_reviews.text: Liked the bottle set up, was very easy to use. Unfortunately, it didn't work for our little guy. After a week his gas had gotten considerably worse and he was unhappy most of the day instead of just in the evenings.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: This has helped my baby so much! It keeps him regular and less fussy because less tummy troubles. I thought it was over priced at first because of the tiny bottle but it last about a month and it is so worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Pratt

customer_reviews.title: Miracle drops
customer_reviews.text: This was our first day with these probiotics and let me tell you, I have a different baby. He was happy all day and not fussy at all. I’m hoping it’s the product and not just a fluke and he happened to just have one good day. Will update review after a couple of days to see how things go but so far this are Miracle drops
customer_reviews.author: A. Blazer

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous for baby
customer_reviews.text: This product was not for us and I would not recommend AT ALL! I used these one my 6 week old 4 times in the past two weeks and EVERY TIME I use them she wakes up from her afternoon Nano with what seems like a dry throat and spit bubbles. It’s almost like she wakes up choking. Scares me senseless so needless to say I’d never use again
customer_reviews.author: Ashley R

customer_reviews.title: doesn't always work
customer_reviews.text: i got this for my baby she is really colicky. it worked great the first few times and now its not working the greatest. i do like how easy it is to drop into her mouth and she doesn't choke on it so that's a plus
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Needs a different method for giving to smaller babies
customer_reviews.text: This probiotic was recommended by my sons doctor so we are giving it a try. We are still very new to using it the only complain we have so far is we wish there was an easier way to give the dosage to smaller babies. Our son is 2 months old and its difficult to use a spoon to give him the probiotic.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Not bad tasting and works immediately!
customer_reviews.text: This helped my son tremendously when he was suffering for gas. I tried everything else on the market and we hit the nail with this one. I have recommended to so many friends
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Great Find!
customer_reviews.text: We have used this probiotic since our son was 1 month old. He has never had a cold or been sick in any manner and he’s 7 months old. I am a HUGE supporter of probiotics since health truly does begin in the gut. These are gentle on his tummy and he doesn’t seem to hate the taste. I definitely will continue using this!
customer_reviews.author: KTJoe

customer_reviews.title: Effect is very good
customer_reviews.text: I gave it to my baby for a month, and the effect is very good, but I think it's a little expensive if it's too small. I don't know if I can keep feeding, so I dare not buy any more
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Lee

customer_reviews.title: Dropper difficult but product works
customer_reviews.text: Product is expensive I have twins so the small bottle really only last me five days. the dropper is difficult to use I have to drop some on my infants pacifier and have them suck it off, when it gets to the bottom it is hard to get the last bit out. Other than this issue the product really works for my babies so I would recommend it to others. The price and the delivery mechanism are the only draw backs.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Buckner

customer_reviews.title: Really helpful
customer_reviews.text: This product really help my baby's colic and reduced the fussy time.
customer_reviews.author: Louis

customer_reviews.title: Biogia
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time purchasing the drops and my son has absolutely no problems with taking them. Within a week I definitely saw a difference in his efforts to go to the bathroom. He wasnt straining anymore! Baby happy, parents happy. The only reason I gave four stars because the containers so small.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha M

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Our newborn we found out was colic on his 2 month checkup. Our Doctor had read many reviews and had seen success himself with BioGaia Probiotics. We ordered it immediately and within a week we were seeing changes in our little one. He was a much happier little guy. We highly recommend! We also continue to use and he just turned 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsi Starks

customer_reviews.title: Happiness in a bottle!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I'm getting these drops. My mother purchased it for my baby who was colicky. They have helped tremendously and she is such a happy baby now. I definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: S.Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Poor container design
customer_reviews.text: I liked the product itself fine. It seemed to help with my infant. However, I have decided not to continue purchasing this product because of the container. Three different times the liquid seeped out of the container when I first opened the product, which meant that over half of the product was wasted. I also didn't think it was as easy to administer because of the container design. If the container was changed, I'd continue to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S Costen

customer_reviews.title: Loooove it
customer_reviews.text: I love BioGaia, is the only probiotic that actually helps my CMPI baby. No more gases, no more constipation, and the most important no more crying.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: These drops have helped my grandson tremendously!!! Love them!! No more tummy troubles for baby.
customer_reviews.author: Thana ONeal

customer_reviews.title: Better than the cheaper brands
customer_reviews.text: This does well for my babies tummy. We had switched to another brand because it was cheaper and my little boy ended up being constipated and really struggling with more tummy issues! We switched back to this and it was better again! We’ve used with breast feeding and formula feeding. I think it helps his tummy.
customer_reviews.author: Sami

customer_reviews.title: Work well
customer_reviews.text: I think these have been helping my baby with gas. Easy to administer.
customer_reviews.author: Sam B

customer_reviews.title: Tummy troubles gone!
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied!! We were having problems with what we assumed was colic . The longest bout of screaming lasted 7 hours one night. This helped her use the bathroom regularly and helped clear her up a lot of her baby acne . Three days on this and we have a whole new baby!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Different product
customer_reviews.text: Very upset. Box came all beat up. Product didn’t look like the one I had purchased before. Gave my baby horrible gas and stomach pains. It did not do this the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Lessy

customer_reviews.title: Eh, I will not purchase again
customer_reviews.text: This was not the miracle worker we had hoped for. It did not help improve my sons tummy problems nor did it help him sleep better. I do not doubt that the probiotic properties did work or do what they were supposed to, but it didn’t solve our problem.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Baby approved
customer_reviews.text: Bought these because my daughter’s GI recommended this particular strain of probiotic. I have noticed definite positive changes with a more regular poop cycle. I also really like the container. It’s so easy to get the drops out vs the bottles that can be very slow to get the drops out.
customer_reviews.author: E Mama

customer_reviews.title: Gross
customer_reviews.text: This made my baby spit up/vomit way more than usual. Babies don’t like the taste at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend these for your baby! I give them to mine everyday at noon and he is a calm and happy baby
customer_reviews.author: Jess miller

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: These work fairly well. They aren’t miraculous but I have noticed a small difference.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this and had it sent to my son across the country for my new little grandson. They told me that it is helping with baby’s colic, so I am please with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be helping heal my infant’s gut. Only ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be helping heal my infant’s gut. Only complaint is it’s a bit hard to give- only 5 drops- I want to make sure she’s getting the entire dose, so I can’t give it in a spoon or syringe.
customer_reviews.author: jwoodie

customer_reviews.title: Good so far
customer_reviews.text: These probiotics seem to be working for our 13 month old so far. We have had redkux, gas and food sensativities since birth. This is one of the only probiotics that don't have added corn, soy, or any other bad stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by pediatrician
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by my daughter’s pediatrician for her constant gas and poop diapers as a newborn. Definitely made a difference and is a clinically recommended treatment for this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Borchardt

customer_reviews.title: Pediatrician and parent recommended
customer_reviews.text: Changed our babies spit up issues immediately. We went from extreme projectile spit ups to barely one small one a day. I highly recommend. It was actually recommended to us first by the pediatrician!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for my baby
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this product. My baby has been using this for more than 2 weeks now and I see no difference with his colic or his bowel movements which are still occurring once every 3 to 4 days. I also didn’t care for how this product is dispensed you have to put 5 drops on a spoon and give to baby.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: Wish I knew about it with baby number 1 at least baby number 2 doesn’t have to suffer... and mama can get some sleep
customer_reviews.author: May

customer_reviews.title: Thank you
customer_reviews.text: Great product for my son. He is on a ketogenic diet and we needed some probiotics with no carbs or sugar. We were reccommended these. My son also has some digestive discomfort and these so far seems to help him a lot . Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great but expensive
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended by multiple pediatricians. Our baby loves it and he never had any stomach problems, he’s been on it since he was born. I wish the price was more affordable- one bottle barely last for 3 weeks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Messy and unsure it works
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if it’s actually working. I haven’t noticed a difference for my baby. Also the solution leaks quite a bit from the bottle and makes a bit of a mess. I wouldn’t purchase this again just because it’s so expensive and I’m loosing a good deal of it from it leaking. Plus I’m not convinced it works for my child.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

product_meta.title: BioGaia Protectis Probiotics Drops for Baby, Infants, Newborn and Kids Colic, Spit-Up, Constipation and Digestive Comfort, 5 ML, 0.17 oz, 1 Pack
product_meta.description: Size:0.17 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)BioGaia Protectis baby drops are the original baby probiotic drops for colic & digestive comfort.* Safe and effective in newborns and up, BioGaia Protectis baby drops have been clinically shown to ease colic, spit-ups, and occasional constipation & diarrhea.* BioGaia is a global probiotic brand with a range of products providing various health benefits for people of all ages.* Available in over 100 countries, BioGaia has 30 years of experience in probiotic research with a network of over 50 research institutes around the globe. BioGaia is committed to the science behind every one of their products. Trust BioGaia for all your probiotic needs. *These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.
feature_bullets: THE ORIGINAL BABY PROBIOTIC DROP: BioGaia Protectis baby drops are the original baby probiotic drops for colic & digestive comfort*
NEWBORNS +: Just 5 drops, once daily, provides the exclusive probiotic L. reuteri Protectis
THE MOST CLINICALLY STUDIED PROBIOTIC FOR COLIC: Shown to reduce crying & fussing in colicky babies*
RELIEVES BABIES’ COMMON DIGESTIVE DISCOMFORT: Ease colic, spit-ups, and occasional constipation & diarrhea*
25-DAY SUPPLY: Non-GMO ingredients, no artificial colors, flavors, dairy or soy
